name: vt-data-ack
description: Represents an acknowledgment for a BACnet VT-Data request, indicating acceptance of new data and the number of octets accepted.

fields.name: all-new-data-accepted
fields.description: Indicates if all new data was accepted (true/false).

fields.name: accepted-octet-count
fields.description: The number of octets accepted, if not all data was accepted. Optional.
